WorkItem.Description:
Have you heard of Source Maps? Source Maps are an idea that has come out of Mozilla for addressing the debugging issues that are raised by *-to-JavaScript
 compilers and JavaScript minifiers, the problem is that when you use these you ultimately aren't debugging what you wrote.

Please create source map option on chirpy to easier to debug javascript files.

http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/developertools/sourcemaps/

Thanks

Comments.Message:
TypeScript have a source map generator inside it's compiler
see custom arguments...
